ygData.subject: Re: Dungeon advice
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sylly - A character as low as level 33 can get experience grouped with people right up to level 50.  Why don t you join them?  I had a great time the other
ygData.messageBody:
James Schuldes wrote:
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> ... When my group went (former group I shud say
> - they are all hi 40's now and <snif sniff> I am stuck in 36 =( ), ...
>
> Sylly

Sylly -

A character as low as level 33 can get experience grouped with people right up
to level 50. Why don't you join them? I had a great time the other night
camping the Savant room in Lower Guk with a bunch of mid-forties. If I hadn't
rushed off to loot a Basalt Carapace and forgotten to get myself re-invised to
undead after looting (thus creating an amusingly huge train of froggies and
skeletons), I would have made it through six hours without dying once, and I
got two bubbles net, anyway. (I wouldn't have died at all if the
bleepity-bleep wizard had kept enough mana for an evac. He managed to med up
just in time to see me croak.) (Well, I take it back - I died 30 seconds into
our very first fight. The Cleric, who is really quite good, told me that he
had forgotten just how fast Bards can dump Hit Points if four things are
whacking them. hehe)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 34 songs, Innoruuk
